trans-unit.source: Represents a local variable within a method or constructor.
trans-unit.target: 表示方法或建構函式 (Constructor) 中的區域變數。

trans-unit.source: A `LocalBuilder` object can be defined using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.DeclareLocal%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A`LocalBuilder`物件可以使用定義<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.DeclareLocal%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a `static` method (`Shared` in Visual Basic) named `Function1` that returns a string and has a parameter of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立`static`方法 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 名為`Function1`所傳回的字串和參數類型<xref:System.Int32>。

trans-unit.source: In the body of the method, the code example creates <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder> objects representing two local variables, and sets symbol information for the local variables.
trans-unit.target: 在方法主體中，程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder>物件，表示兩個本機變數，然後設定符號的本機變數的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The method does not do anything significant, but the method body demonstrates storing a parameter to a local variable, storing a literal string to a local variable, and loading a local variable.
trans-unit.target: 方法不會進行任何重要的但方法主體中示範儲存區域變數，儲存的本機變數、 常值字串及載入本機變數的參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the object referred to by the local variable is pinned in memory.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在記憶體中 Pin 區域變數參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object referred to by the local variable is pinned in memory; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在記憶體中 Pin 區域變數參考的物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In unsafe code, an object must be pinned before it can be referred to by an unmanaged pointer.
trans-unit.target: Unsafe 程式碼中，它可以所參考之 unmanaged 指標之前必須固定物件。

trans-unit.source: While the referenced object is pinned, it cannot be moved by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 雖然參考的物件已釘選，無法將它移透過記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the local variable within the method body.
trans-unit.target: 取得方法主體內區域變數之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the order of declaration of the local variable within the method body.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，表示方法主體內區域變數的宣告順序。

trans-unit.source: Index numbers are assigned to local variables in the order in which they are declared or emitted, beginning with zero.
trans-unit.target: 索引編號會指派給本機變數的順序中的宣告或發出，開頭為零。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the local variable.
trans-unit.target: 取得區域變數的型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the local variable.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `LocalType`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`LocalType`。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder>類別。

trans-unit.source: Sets the local variable's symbolic information.
trans-unit.target: 設定區域變數的符號資訊。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local variable.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of this local variable.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個區域變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder.SetLocalSymInfo%2A> method is supported for methods defined in dynamic types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder.SetLocalSymInfo%2A>方法支援動態類型中定義的方法。

trans-unit.source: It is not supported for dynamic methods defined using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> class.
trans-unit.target: 不支援的動態方法，使用定義<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder.SetLocalSymInfo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder.SetLocalSymInfo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder>類別。

trans-unit.source: The containing type has been created with <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含的型別已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 建立。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is no symbolic writer defined for the containing module.
trans-unit.target: 沒有為包含的模組所定義的符號寫入器。

trans-unit.source: This local is defined in a dynamic method, rather than in a method of a dynamic type.
trans-unit.target: 這個區域是定義於動態方法中，而不是動態型別的方法中。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local variable.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The beginning offset of the lexical scope of the local variable.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數語彙範圍的起始位移 (Offset)。

trans-unit.source: The ending offset of the lexical scope of the local variable.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數語彙範圍的結束位移。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name and lexical scope of this local variable.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個區域變數的名稱和語彙範圍 (Lexical Scope)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder.SetLocalSymInfo%2A> method is supported for methods defined in dynamic types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder.SetLocalSymInfo%2A>方法支援動態類型中定義的方法。

trans-unit.source: It is not supported for dynamic methods defined using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> class.
trans-unit.target: 不支援的動態方法，使用定義<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder.SetLocalSymInfo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder.SetLocalSymInfo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.LocalBuilder>類別。

trans-unit.source: The containing type has been created with <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含的型別已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 建立。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is no symbolic writer defined for the containing module.
trans-unit.target: 沒有為包含的模組所定義的符號寫入器。

trans-unit.source: This local is defined in a dynamic method, rather than in a method of a dynamic type.
trans-unit.target: 這個區域是定義於動態方法中，而不是動態型別的方法中。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應之傳入的名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應的名稱計數。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

trans-unit.source: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端配置的陣列，用於接收對應於名稱的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 類型資訊的地區設定識別項。

trans-unit.source: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 接收要求的類型資訊物件的指標。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 指向接收物件提供的類型資訊介面數目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件提供的類型資訊介面數目 (0 或 1)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the member.
trans-unit.target: 辨識成員。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 地區設定內容，用於解譯引數。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 結構的指標，此結構包含引數陣列、指名引數之 DISPID 引數的陣列，以及陣列中項目數目的計數。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向用於儲存結果之位置的指標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 包含例外狀況資訊的結構指標。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一個有錯誤的引數索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::Invoke`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。
